page.title: 20Thanks for Help Received
page.content:
We are Class 9 of Thurcroft Junior School,Rotherham: Paul Attewell,Paul Barrass,Andrew Boot,Jonathan Boynton,Craig Brunyee,James Davies,Steven Gratton, Glyn Haywood,Darren Hill,Gary Howis, Shaun Hulse,Paul Marsden,Kevin Payton, Ronald Rankin,Michael Timms,Louise Addy,Lisa Butterfield,Melanie Davenport,Helen Dixon,Trudy Dunham, Claire Hewkin,Kerry Joynson,Joanne Kay,Karen Langford,Amanda Leigh,Becky Melber,Joanne Pickford,Julie Shevels, Carrie Smith,Joanne Ward,Karen Whitehead,Helen Williams,Amanda Wright Mr.J.Holt
We would like to thank the rest of the staff and pupils,the people of Thurcroft,and in particular Mr P Blackwell,Mr J Boynton and Mr B Timms for their help.
